attributes.action: make christmas day a national day off  especially for food outlets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i work in a resturant and we are open 365 days a year 11am to 12pm even christmas day , prime minister please make this day a day for families and beliefs not working providing a company and working over a hot grill all day, they dont even give staff any extra money lets put a stop to this on christmas day otherwise soon it will end up as a normal day in a few years time. christmas is the one day we ask for off prime minister and all please consider.
